content: fonte cowl 2024 by petra breakstone the fonte cowl is knitted both in the round and flat a staggered cable stitch pattern is done without cable needle and i for one love that fact the bottom edge gets knitted flat and also gets a very stylish chenille touch you can flip that part over and create a cute collar for a cowl this one gives you styling options the pattern is written and offers a chart for the cable pattern the unblocked cowl measures 24 in circumference and 9 5 in height yarn abbreviations c1- a single skein of lively 153 yards/75 co - cast on grams of cotton/acrylic in a dk weight k - knit c2- a mini skein of chenille in a bulky weight p - purl 4 yards for the accent around the neckline repeat - repeat sl1k2yo-p - slip 1 purl wise knit 2 yarn knit kits at www yarnz2go com over pass slipped stitch over all 4 stitches st s - stitch es yo notions needed us size 8 11 mm circular needle 20 techniques applied 51 cm in length crochet hook size i 5 5 mm for pink accent knitting and purling both in the round and stitch marker flat cable knitting without cable needle tapestry needle or crochet hook for finishing binding off loosely weaving in ends blocking is optional gauge level of expertise 15 sts and 21 row in 4 of stockinette stitch intermediate © petra breakstone enjoy your project page 1 of 2 fonte cowl 2024 by petra breakstone part 1 getting started with c1 knitted in the part 5 garter stitch edge worked flat round with c1 co 90 sts place marker and join in the round remove marker and turn your work being careful not to twist stitches knit 12 row round 1 knit bind off loosely round 2 purl repeat rounds 1 and 2 one more time finishing knit 4 more rounds weave in all ends and block part 2 first cable set with c1 blocking tip round 1 * k7 sl1k2yo-p repeat from * to end of i block my non wool yarns with a steam round iron set to proper temp and place a rounds 2 to 4 knit hankie or thin dish towel between the repeat rounds 1 to 4 one more time fabric and iron works like a charm crochet stitch detail around garter part 3 second cable set with c1 edge with c2 yarn see black arrows in photo below round 1 * k4 sl1k2 yo-p k3 repeat from * to end of round * insert hook into next st yo draw up rounds 2 to 4 knit loop you now have 2 sts on your hook repeat rounds 1 to 4 one more time yo again pull through all three sts on hook repeat from * all around the middle part 4 repeat parts 2 and 3 with c1 opening from one side ending at one more time opposite end web www
